comment: Ha! You better like being humiliated in front of the entire class for asking a question! Or just love the feeling of being dumb because that's exactly how she will make you feel! Worstweirdest lady ever.

if you have a job or family or friends you might as well say goodbye to them now. she requires at minimum 6+ hours of extra work outside of class for her ELECTIVE class. she does not explain how to use software or equipment. she encourages questions but when you ask you better be prepared for her to make you feel like an idiot in front of the class

I've never been so excited for a class before until I met this lady. She teaches nothing but expects you to bra pro. And when your not she gives you an extremely low grade and it could be such an easy class. Avoid at all cost!

Attendance is not mandatory, but she gets publicly upset if you cannot make it to class or have to leave early for any reason. Talks down to you if you do not understand something or needs help. Has her nice moments, but has a tendency to be rude. Will email you if something is missing from a project, but requires too much out of class work.
